definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: blossom (perhaps fr. above √, blossom, flower, as shining amid leaves);—abs. ´[[נ]] of vine Is 18:5 (‖[[פֶּרַח]]; = berry-cluster acc. to Di Kit Che:Hpt cf. J. Derenb:ZAW v (1885), 301 f.; vi (1886), 98 f.); sf. [[נִצָּתוֹ]] Job 15:33 (of olive); read also [[נִצָּתָהּ]] Ge 40:10 (of vine) for MT [[נִצָּהּ]], cf. Di Holz.
